messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

virus on laptop endpoint causes laptop to work very slow virus laptop hi have virus laptop keeps dropping off struggle make calls cannot connect last laptop ran out space could find anywhere free up any space morning after reboot had free space but during dropped still going down working but need someone look thing monday or send some troubleshooting tools today thanks

I'm now zeroing in on the core issue. While storage is mentioned, the key problem is the virus and its resulting impact. It is broader than an endpoint hardware failure.
